entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border overnight early this evening. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
